main event: A civilian observed a white, round object changing shape over Tucson, Arizona, in 1949.
interesting points: The object appeared to change from a football bladder shape to a flat shape while drifting,The sighting lasted for about 10-15 minutes,The object was reflecting sunlight as it moved,The observer described the object as being at a high altitude and initially the size of a tennis ball,No sound or exhaust was associated with the object.
witness description: A civilian observer, described as having average intelligence and character.
